page.title: 06GOWY VALLEY TRANSPORT
page.content: Main form of transport is cars 61% own two cars, only 3% have none. A41 Roman road, secondary and estate roads. Most children own bicycles limited to local riding because of traffic density on outskirts of villages. Bus services to all villages. School bus to secondary schools. {RAILWAYS}no station or signal box, 2 lines. Traffic (listed one way) Daily_ 17 2nd & 10 1st class passenger, 6 coal from Point of Ayr & Bensham collieries to Fiddlers Power station and 2 steel ingots for steel mill at Shotton. Weekly_ 17 freight trains.
